name: Cisco | IOS | Network | MAC | Invalid MAC (SYSLOG)
description: %C4K_L2MAN-6-INVALIDSOURCEADDRESSPACKET: (Suppressed 1 times)Packet received with invalid source MAC address (00:00:00:00:00:00) on port Gi2/11 in vlan 100

patterns.value_re: %C\d+K.+INVALIDSOURCEADDRESSPACKET: \(Suppressed \d+ times\)\s*Packet received with invalid source MAC address \((?P<mac>\S+)\) on port (?P<interface>\S+) in vlan (?P<vlan>\d+)
